00007 ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::ORGretaMarkIVDecoder() 
00008 {
00009   fHasMasterHeader = false;
00010   fHasSlaverHeader = false;
00011   fOffset = 0;
00012   fBitMask = 0xFFFF;
00013 }
00014 
00015 //**************************************************************************************
00016 
00017 bool ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::SetDataRecord(UInt_t* dataRecord) 
00018 {
00019   fDataRecord = dataRecord;
00020   /* first thing first, figure out if this record has a Master Header*/
00021   if (GetMasterHeaderLength() == LengthOf(dataRecord) - kORCAHeadLen) {
00022     /* Neither the master header exists, nor the slave header. */
00023     fHasMasterHeader = false;
00024     fHasSlaverHeader = false;
00025     fOffset = 0;
00026   } else if (GetMasterHeaderLength() == kMasterHeadLen &&
00027       GetSlaveHeaderLength()  == kSlaveHeaderLen) {
00028     fHasMasterHeader = true;
00029     fHasSlaverHeader = true;
00030     fOffset = (size_t)kMasterHeadLen+kSlaveHeaderLen;
00031   } else {
00032     fHasMasterHeader = false;
00033     fHasSlaverHeader = true;
00034     fOffset = (size_t)kSlaveHeaderLen;
00035   }
00036   return ORGretaDecoder::SetDataRecord(dataRecord);
00037 }
00038 
00039 UInt_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetEventWaveformPoint( size_t /*event*/, 
00040                                                      size_t waveformPoint )
00041 {
00042   if ( waveformPoint % 2 == 0 ) {
00043     return (GetWaveformDataPointer()[waveformPoint/2] & fBitMask); 
00044   } else {
00045     return ( ( GetWaveformDataPointer()[waveformPoint/2] & (fBitMask << 16) )  >> 16);
00046   } 
00047 }
